data.title: You can tell me anything
data.meta_description: Read You can tell me anything from the story Niall Horan Imagines by Meshabeyond with 5,873 reads. imaginesss, onedirection, imagines.  Y/BN ~Your Brother's Na...
data.text:
Y/BN ~Your Brother's Name

You were laying in the bed with your boyfriend Niall his arms Wrapped around your waist. He was sleeping and you were watching TV You smiled to yourself Looking at Niall Sleeping Peacefully Everyday you wondered how'd you get so lucky You had the best boyfriend the best friends your life was going so good right now and you could've been happier. You phone started to Vibrate you slowly turned around not wanting to wake Niall up and Picked your phone up you looked at the Caller ID why is he calling you wondered because he rarely calls you. You silently get up from the bed and walking into the hallway silently closing the door. You slid your phone to answer.

"Y/BN!" You panicked whispering it was your brother you never really talked to him because He never Called you and every time he did call you it was to cuss you out. You let him because he was your brother and he was family the only family you had left.

"Hey Sis" He slurred through the phone.

"Are you drunk?" You asked quietly.

"No why would you think I was drunk I can't call you anymore your to good for me?" He snapped and you started to put your shoes on. When he was like this he didn't know how to control himself You didn't want him to go back to Jail.

"Where are you?" You questioned putting your coat on it's to late for this he didn't say anything you sighed.

"Where are you Y/BN!" You repeated walking out of the house and getting in the car.

"FUCK YOU Y/N!" He yelled hanging the phone up you sighed and pulled out of the driveway.

After about A half an Hour Later you finally found Your brother walking along the streets Of you and his childhood. You rolled down the window and he looked up at you He looked horrible He looked like he haven't showered in days.

"Get in the Car" You demanded and he walked up to your car and got in he smelled like he bathed in Beers.

"I'm sick of this Y/BN" You told him driving off.

"Nobody told you to come and get me Just stop the car I'll walk home I don't need your help" He said and you shook your head.

"Yes you do You need to stop drinking You going to end up back in Jail stop doing this to yourself." You stated keeping your eyes on the road you hated seeing your brother like this.

"Well Excuse Your majesty but you don't tell me how to live My Life I can do what the hell I want. Your not my mom Go back to your perfect Life and just leave me alone." He said his voice loud and angry.

"I'm your sister and I'm not perfect and I don't have a perfect life." You said and he didn't say anything the rest of the ride you were grateful for that. Your phone started ringing you looked at the caller ID and sighed.

It was Niall

You pressed ignore Niall knew nothing about your past And you didn't want him to you kept it from him because you thought he wouldn't want to be with you anymore your Life was never perfect and Your brother out of anyone should know that. After everything that went on your glad to have Niall in your life because of the fact that he and your friends are the only good thing that's happened to you in a while you and Niall have only been together for six months.

You and your brother lived in a small house with Your Mom and your step dad. Your step dad was abusive and Would beat you and your brother and your mom. It was horrible and finally when You called the police things only got worse because they only took you. And your brother was stuck there You didn't know what happened but you know it only got worst because every month when your mom and him use to visit you they would look horrible especially your mom. She'd look weaker and weaker each month. Until they Just stopped visiting Your mom went missing no where to be found they believe she is dead because she was beaten so much that she just couldn't take it.
